org.apache.juneau.http

Class BasicHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.http.BasicHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Header, NameValuePair
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicCsvArrayHeader, BasicDateHeader, BasicEntityTagArrayHeader, BasicEntityTagHeader, BasicIntegerHeader, BasicLongHeader, BasicStringHeader, BasicStringRangeArrayHeader, BasicUriHeader, SerializedHeader

    @BeanIgnore
public class BasicHeader
extends Object
implements Header, Cloneable, Serializable
    Superclass of all headers defined in this package. Provides the following features:
    • Default support for various streams and readers.
    • Content from Suppliers.
    • Caching.
    • Fluent setters.
    • Fluent assertions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • of

        public static BasicHeader of(String name,
                             Supplier<?> value)
        Convenience creator using supplier.

        Header value is re-evaluated on each call to getValue().

        value - The parameter value supplier.
        Any non-String value will be converted to a String using Object.toString().
